data.text:
For some reason, when I pushed the button for coffee, 
a sweet-looking drink came out of the vending machine.
data.processed:
<story>For some reason, when I pushed the button for coffee, 
<story>a sweet-looking drink came out of the vending machine.

data.text:
Because of work, I was eating lunch later than usual. 
But luckily, I was still able to get the usual.
data.processed:
<story>Because of work, I was eating lunch later than usual. 
<story>But luckily, I was still able to get the usual.

data.text:
It had been a while since that really rainy day. The only thing I 
could think of was trying to figure out what 『Marvelous』 meant――
data.processed:
<story>It had been a while since that really rainy day. The only thing I 
<story>could think of was trying to figure out what 『Marvelous』 meant――

data.text:
At night, when I was brushing my teeth, I would wonder if 
this was marvelous. In the morning, when deciding which 
sock to put on first, I'd wonder if this was marvelous.
data.processed:
<story>At night, when I was brushing my teeth, I would wonder if 
<story>this was marvelous. In the morning, when deciding which 
<story>sock to put on first, I'd wonder if this was marvelous.

data.text:
Normally, you'd think I should be focusing on 
scouting an Uma Musume, but instead, I was 
desperately searching for the meaning of marvelous.
data.processed:
<story>Normally, you'd think I should be focusing on 
<story>scouting an Uma Musume, but instead, I was 
<story>desperately searching for the meaning of marvelous.

data.text:
At this rate, my everday life would be destroyed 
by marvelous. Or was it already too late? I mean, 
it seemed like I could hear it right now――
data.processed:
<story>At this rate, my everday life would be destroyed 
<story>by marvelous. Or was it already too late? I mean, 
<story>it seemed like I could hear it right now――

data.text: Marvelous☆★☆
data.processed: <story>Marvelous☆★☆

data.text: Ahahahaa☆ Were you surprised? Were you surprised?
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>Ahahahaa☆ Were you surprised? Were you surprised?

data.text:
It wasn't that I was surprised. I was worried that I 
was so far gone that I was marvelously hearing things!
data.processed:
<story>It wasn't that I was surprised. I was worried that I 
<story>was so far gone that I was marvelously hearing things!

data.text:
Oh little lost lamb, how do you do☆? 
Can't find Marvelous? I'll just show you★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Oh little lost lamb, how do you do☆? 
<story>Can't find Marvelous? I'll just show you★

data.text:
Marvelous, you see, is sparkly, exciting, derring-do☆ 
It's always there all around, just waiting for someone like you★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Marvelous, you see, is sparkly, exciting, derring-do☆ 
<story>It's always there all around, just waiting for someone like you★

data.text:
So c'mon, let's go☆ 
Allllll~ that's Marvelous, Trainer, it's time for a show!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>So c'mon, let's go☆ 
<story>Allllll~ that's Marvelous, Trainer, it's time for a show!

data.text:
Declaring that, Marvelous Sunday grabbed my arm and pulled 
me along. Her hands seemed particularly warm.
data.processed:
<story>Declaring that, Marvelous Sunday grabbed my arm and pulled 
<story>me along. Her hands seemed particularly warm.

data.text:
I couldn't say no to that, because I wanted 
to know the truth about 『Marvelous』, but――
data.processed:
<story>I couldn't say no to that, because I wanted 
<story>to know the truth about 『Marvelous』, but――

data.text: Nature~! Laurel~! Ahahahaa, Marvelous!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>Nature~! Laurel~! Ahahahaa, Marvelous!

data.text:
C'mon, you're late……wait, huh? Aren't you that trainer from 
before? Ahaha, she caught you, huh? Good work~, I guess.
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>C'mon, you're late……wait, huh? Aren't you that trainer from 
<story>before? Ahaha, she caught you, huh? Good work~, I guess.

data.text:
Oh, guess I haven't introduced myself yet. I'm Nice Nature. Marvelous 
is my roommate, guess you could call it an inevitable relationship.
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>Oh, guess I haven't introduced myself yet. I'm Nice Nature. Marvelous 
<story>is my roommate, guess you could call it an inevitable relationship.

data.text:
I'm Sakura Laurel♪ Marve-chan's…… Hmmm~, I guess 
you could say friendly rival, something like that?
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>I'm Sakura Laurel♪ Marve-chan's…… Hmmm~, I guess 
<story>you could say friendly rival, something like that?

data.text:
Ahahaa, inevitable rivals! Sounds fun~! 
It's like fate, so very Marvelous☆, isn't it!?
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Ahahaa, inevitable rivals! Sounds fun~! 
<story>It's like fate, so very Marvelous☆, isn't it!?

data.text:
You see, Trainer, Nature and Laurel are really Marvelous! 
When they run, it's like zooooom, whooosh, and zip!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>You see, Trainer, Nature and Laurel are really Marvelous! 
<story>When they run, it's like zooooom, whooosh, and zip!

data.text:
When they're on their own they're Marvelous, but when they're together, 
they're even more Marvelous! I'm sure Trainer can tell too!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>When they're on their own they're Marvelous, but when they're together, 
<story>they're even more Marvelous! I'm sure Trainer can tell too!

data.text: Wait wait, even if you say that, they can't tell with that.
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed: <story>Wait wait, even if you say that, they can't tell with that.

data.text:
Wait…… something feels off here. 
Aren't you a bit more lively than usual?
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>Wait…… something feels off here. 
<story>Aren't you a bit more lively than usual?

data.text:
I was looking forward to parallel training but…… Hmmmmm~? Marve-chan, 
are you hiding something from us? Like you're feeling off or――
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>I was looking forward to parallel training but…… Hmmmmm~? Marve-chan, 
<story>are you hiding something from us? Like you're feeling off or――

data.text:
Not a bit~! Today, I'm very Marvelous☆ too, you know. If I can run 
with Laurel and Nature, it'll be mooore~ Marvelous★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

choices.text: But, your hands were really warm……?

data.processed:
<story>Not a bit~! Today, I'm very Marvelous☆ too, you know. If I can run 
<story>with Laurel and Nature, it'll be mooore~ Marvelous★

data.text:
When I mentioned that to Sakura Laurel and Nice Nature, 
it seemed like their expressions clouded a bit.
data.processed:
<story>When I mentioned that to Sakura Laurel and Nice Nature, 
<story>it seemed like their expressions clouded a bit.

data.text:
I see, so that's how it is, huh. ――In that case, Marve-chan, we'll 
hold off on today's training! Let's head to the infirmary, okay?
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>I see, so that's how it is, huh. ――In that case, Marve-chan, we'll 
<story>hold off on today's training! Let's head to the infirmary, okay?

data.text:
Eeeeeeh, why!? 
What about Marvelous? What about training~!?
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Eeeeeeh, why!? 
<story>What about Marvelous? What about training~!?

data.text:
Geez, I'm glad we realized it was a slight fever. 
If she did training like that, it would definitely get worse.
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>Geez, I'm glad we realized it was a slight fever. 
<story>If she did training like that, it would definitely get worse.

data.text:
Trainer-san too, thanks for coming with us. 
Marve-chan's always pushing herself like that.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san too, thanks for coming with us. 
<story>Marve-chan's always pushing herself like that.

data.text:
Hmmmm~…… usually it doesn't get as bad as a fever. The current 
Marve-chan doesn't have a particularly weak constitution.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Hmmmm~…… usually it doesn't get as bad as a fever. The current 
<story>Marve-chan doesn't have a particularly weak constitution.

data.text:
It's just, when she was little she was often 
sick, so maybe that's related. She's so lively 
that she moves around alot so that could be it too.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>It's just, when she was little she was often 
<story>sick, so maybe that's related. She's so lively 
<story>that she moves around alot so that could be it too.

data.text:
It's not that I don't understand how nice it is to be able to run around, 
but, it does worry me that she doesn't seem to know her limits……
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>It's not that I don't understand how nice it is to be able to run around, 
<story>but, it does worry me that she doesn't seem to know her limits……

data.text:
But well, there's a Selection race soon after all. I guess we'll 
just hope she can find a trainer that's good at managing that.
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>But well, there's a Selection race soon after all. I guess we'll 
<story>just hope she can find a trainer that's good at managing that.

data.text:
That was unexpected. From what I had seen so far of Marvelous Sunday, 
she was always cheerful and powerful. But if I think back on it――
data.processed:
<story>That was unexpected. From what I had seen so far of Marvelous Sunday, 
<story>she was always cheerful and powerful. But if I think back on it――

data.text:
The day I met her, she had suddenly collapsed 
due to exhaustion on the course. Seemed like 
it was true, that she was bad at putting on the brakes.
data.processed:
<story>The day I met her, she had suddenly collapsed 
<story>due to exhaustion on the course. Seemed like 
<story>it was true, that she was bad at putting on the brakes.

data.text:
I was captivated by her cheerful laugh while running, maybe that 
was why I was so interested in the meaning of 『Marvelous』.
data.processed:
<story>I was captivated by her cheerful laugh while running, maybe that 
<story>was why I was so interested in the meaning of 『Marvelous』.

data.text:
However, for her 『Marvelous』 seemed to have some kind of 
meaning that made her pursue it to the detriment of her health.
data.processed:
<story>However, for her 『Marvelous』 seemed to have some kind of 
<story>meaning that made her pursue it to the detriment of her health.

data.text:
I was confused by the large gap between her 
energetic appearance whenever she said 『Marvelous!』 
and her current state of laying passed out in bed.
data.processed:
<story>I was confused by the large gap between her 
<story>energetic appearance whenever she said 『Marvelous!』 
<story>and her current state of laying passed out in bed.

data.text:
She said she'd show me what marvelous meant. 
When she's better, I'll ask her directly what it means.
data.processed:
<story>She said she'd show me what marvelous meant. 
<story>When she's better, I'll ask her directly what it means.

data.text: (……Ah, again……it's that dream……)
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>(……Ah, again……it's that dream……)

data.text: (It's cold……and dark……)
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>(It's cold……and dark……)

data.text: Mama…… Papa……?
data.name: Young Marvelous
data.processed: <story>Mama…… Papa……?

data.text:
(Around this time I……didn't have the 
strength to find what was marvelous……)
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>(Around this time I……didn't have the 
<story>strength to find what was marvelous……)

data.text: ……Grandm-……
data.name: Young Marvelous
data.processed: <story>……Grandm-……
